sense.def:
Spots
so majhne, okrogle, obarvane lise na neki površini.

seg.quote: She was wearing a white blouse with red spots.

sense.def:
Spots
so majhne bule ali znamenja na človekovi koži.

seg.quote: Their bites leave itching red spots on the skin.

sense.def:
A spot of a substance
je majhna količina neke snovi.

seg.quote: I felt a few spots of rain.

sense.def:
A spot of something
je majhna količina nečesa;

seg.quote: What about a spot of lunch?

sense.def:
Določen kraj lahko imenujemo
a spot
.

seg.quote: It's a lovely spot for a picnic.
Four brass plates in the floor mark the spot where the throne stood.

sense.def:
To spot something
pomeni nekaj opaziti.

seg.quote: I spotted you standing by your car at the gas station.

sense.def:
To be on the spot
pomeni biti natančno na tistem kraju, kjer se nekaj dogaja.

seg.quote: Certain decisions had to be taken by the man on the spot.

sense.def:
To do something on the spot
pomeni nekaj storiti nemudoma.

seg.quote: They dismissed him on the spot.

sense.def:
To put someone on the spot
pomeni nekoga spraviti v težaven položaj.
